roasters.name: Café de Spécialité Paris
roasters.description: Artisan roaster specializing in single-origin coffees from Ethiopia and Colombia

roasters.name: Nordic Coffee Roasters
roasters.description: Scandinavian approach to coffee roasting with focus on light roasts

coffees.name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe Natural
coffees.description: A vibrant Ethiopian coffee with intense blueberry and floral notes. Naturally processed for maximum fruit sweetness. Perfect for pour-over brewing methods.

coffees.name: Colombian Huila Washed
coffees.description: Clean and balanced Colombian coffee with caramel sweetness and chocolate notes. Washed processing brings out clarity and brightness.
